/* Question A bar chart what are the phone numbers for each employee ? , could list Y-axis from low ? */
Database schema: Table Employee, columns = [*,EmployeeId, LastName FirstName Title ReportsTo, BirthDate HireDate Address City Country PostalCode Phone, Fax Email]
Answer: Visualize BAR SELECT Phone , COUNT(Phone) FROM EMPLOYEE GROUP Phone ORDER ASC

/* Question What are the names races held between 2009 , count them by a bar chart , rank from low by the X . */
Database schema Table races, columns = [*,raceId, year round circuitId name date time url
Answer: Visualize BAR SELECT name , COUNT(name FROM races YEAR BETWEEN 2009 2011 GROUP name ORDER ASC

/* Question Visualize a bar chart for what are locations all circuits France or ? */
Database schema: Table circuits, columns = [*,circuitId, circuitRef name location country lat lng alt url
Answer: Visualize BAR SELECT location , circuitId FROM circuits WHERE country "France OR "Belgium

/* Question A bar chart for listing the phone numbers all employees , sort names from high . */

Answer: Visualize BAR SELECT Phone , COUNT(Phone) FROM EMPLOYEE GROUP

/* Question Visualize a bar chart for what are locations all circuits France or , and show X from high please . */
Database schema: Table circuits, columns = [*,circuitId, circuitRef name location country lat lng alt url
Answer Visualize BAR SELECT location , circuitId FROM circuits WHERE country = "France" OR country = "Belgium" ORDER location

questions.response: Visualize BAR SELECT Last_year , COUNT(Last_year) FROM party WHERE Party_Theme = "Spring" OR Party_Theme = "Teqnology" ORDER BY COUNT(Last_year) ASC BIN Last_year BY WEEKDAY
